title: SPS Case Extraction Record
description: Schema generated from SPS_column_dictionary.csv for constraining structured extraction outputs (e.g., LangExtract).

extractor.description: Section: 0. General / extraction metadata | Meaning: Initials of extractor | Guidance: Initials of extractor

Reference.description: Section: 1.section: Identifier and case vignette | Meaning: ID | Guidance: ID

case_ID.description: Section: 1.section: Identifier and case vignette | Meaning: Case reference within the article (case#) | Guidance: Case reference within the article (case#)

age_description.description: Section: 1.section: Identifier and case vignette | Meaning: Age at description | Guidance: Age at description

sex.description: Section: 1.section: Identifier and case vignette | Meaning: Sex: M or F | Guidance: Sex: M or F

ethnicity.description:
Section: section: basic demographic data | Meaning: Ethnicity (select one) | Guidance: Ethnicity (select one)
- white = White/Caucasian
- africa = African/ Afro-Caribbean
- E_asia = East Asia (Japan, Korea, China)
- S_asia = South Asia (India, Pakistan, Bangladesh, Sri Lanka)
- SE_asia = South East Asian (everything East of India and South of China which will cover Thailand, Malaysia, Singapore)
- latin = Latin American (non-African origin; central and S America, without Caribbean)
- other = other (specify in next column)

age_onset.description: Section: section: basic demographic data | Meaning: Age at onset | Guidance: Age at onset

time_to_diagnosis.description: Section: section: basic demographic data | Meaning: Time to diagnosis (years) | Guidance: Time to diagnosis (years)

first_manifestation.description:
Section: section: basic demographic data | Meaning: First manifestation (select) | Guidance: First manifestation (select)
- stiffness
- spasms
- startle = excessive startle
- multiple = multiple, specify in next cols
- other = other, specify in next cols

enum: As per code list in the column description

anyOf.description: Section: section: basic demographic data | Meaning: First manifestation (multiple) | Guidance: First manifestation (multiple)
Section: section: basic demographic data | Meaning: First manifestation (multiple) | Guidance: First manifestation (multiple)

first_manifestation_other.description: Section: section: basic demographic data | Meaning: First manifestation (other) | Guidance: First manifestation (other)

included_diagnosis.description:
Section: section: basic demographic data | Meaning: Diagnosis of participants included (select) | Guidance: Diagnosis of participants included (select)
- Stiff_Person
- Stiff_Limb
- PERM
- new_category = new category if identified, specify
- mixed = mixed population
- other = other, specify in next column
- NA = not available, NA, not reported

included_diagnosis_specify.description: Section: section: basic demographic data | Meaning: Diagnosis (specify) | Guidance: Diagnosis (specify) If you selected new_category or other, specify with text

diagnostic_criteria.description: Section: section: basic demographic data | Meaning: Diagnostic Criteria Used : Provide below the details of the criteria used to make the diagnosis - copy and paste from text if needed | Guidance: Diagnostic Criteria Used : Provide below the details of the criteria used to make the diagnosis - copy and paste from text if needed

early_symptoms.description:
Section: section: basic demographic data | Meaning: Overview_SPSD symptoms / early disease (select) | Guidance: Overview_SPSD symptoms / early disease (select)
- stiffness
- spasms
- startle = excessive startle

stiffness_distribution_onset.description:
Section: section: basic demographic data | Meaning: Stiffness distribution (select) | Guidance: Stiffness distribution (select)
- lumb_prox_LE = lumbar/proximal legs
- distal_LE = distal leg(s)
- UE = arm(s) / upper extremity
- axial = axial(thoracic,neck)
- trismus
- multiple = multiple, but not generalised (specify in next col)
- generalised = generalised
- other = other, specify in next col

enum: As per code list in the column description

anyOf.description: Section: section: basic demographic data | Meaning: Stiffness distribution: multiple (text) | Guidance: Stiffness distribution: multiple (text)
Section: section: basic demographic data | Meaning: Stiffness distribution: multiple (text) | Guidance: Stiffness distribution: multiple (text)

stiffness_distribution_onset_other.description: Section: section: basic demographic data | Meaning: Stiffness distribution: other (text) | Guidance: Stiffness distribution: other (text)

spasms_distribution_onset.description:
Section: section: basic demographic data | Meaning: Spasms distribution (select) | Guidance: Spasms distribution (select)
- lumb_prox_LE = lumbar/proximal legs
- distal_LE = distal leg(s)
- UE = arm(s) / upper extremity
- axial = axial(thoracic,neck)
- generalised
- multiple = multiple, but not generalised (specify in next col)
- other = other, specify in next col

enum: As per code list in the column description

anyOf.description: Section: 3. section: disease onset, signs and symptoms | Meaning: Spasms distribution: multiple (text) | Guidance: Spasms distribution: multiple (text)
Section: 3. section: disease onset, signs and symptoms | Meaning: Spasms distribution: multiple (text) | Guidance: Spasms distribution: multiple (text)

spasms_distribution_onset_other.description: Section: 3. section: disease onset, signs and symptoms | Meaning: Spasms distribution: other (text) | Guidance: Spasms distribution: other (text)

excessive_startle_onset.description:
Section: 3. section: disease onset, signs and symptoms | Meaning: Excessive startle (select) | Guidance: Excessive startle (select)
- touch = to touch
- noise = to noise
- visual = to visual stimuli
- multiple (specify in next col)
- other (specify in next col)

enum: As per code list in the column description

anyOf.description: Section: 3. section: disease onset, signs and symptoms | Meaning: Excessive startle: multiple (text) | Guidance: Excessive startle: multiple (text)
Section: 3. section: disease onset, signs and symptoms | Meaning: Excessive startle: multiple (text) | Guidance: Excessive startle: multiple (text)

excessive_startle_onset_other.description: Section: 3. section: disease onset, signs and symptoms | Meaning: Excessive startle: other (text) | Guidance: Excessive startle: other (text)

anxiety_onset.description:
Section: 3. section: disease onset, signs and symptoms | Meaning: Anxiety (select) | Guidance: Anxiety (select)
- walking = anxiety related to walking unaided
- generalised = specify in next col

anxiety_onset_generalised.description: Section: 3. section: disease onset, signs and symptoms | Meaning: Anxiety: generalised (text) | Guidance: Anxiety: generalised (text)

other_symptoms_onset.description:
Section: 3. section: disease onset, signs and symptoms | Meaning: Other symptoms: list all that apply within 1 cell, separated by semicolons | Guidance: Other symptoms: list all that apply within 1 cell, separated by semicolons (example: hyperhidrosis; babinski; sensory)
- hyperhidrosis
- autonomic = other autonomic symptoms (see legend and specify in next col)
- hyperreflexia
- babinski
- weakness
- lower_motor_neuron
- encephalopathy
- seizures = specify type
- oculomotor = specify type
- ptosis
- dysphagia
- dysgeusia
- sensory = hyp/paraesthesia
- allodynia
- freezing = freezing episodes
- LPR = lead pipe rigidity
- other = specify in next col

other_symptoms_onset_auto.description: Section: 3. section: disease onset, signs and symptoms | Meaning: Other symptoms: autonomic (text) | Guidance: Other symptoms: autonomic (text)

other_symptoms_onset_oculo.description: Section: 3. section: disease onset, signs and symptoms | Meaning: Other symptoms: oculomotor (text) | Guidance: Other symptoms: oculomotor (text)

other_symptoms_onset_seizures.description: Section: 3. section: disease onset, signs and symptoms | Meaning: Other symptoms: seizures (text) | Guidance: Other symptoms: seizures (text)

onset_mRS.description:
Section: 3. section: disease onset, signs and symptoms | Meaning: Disability at onset - SPSD symptoms established; mRS | Guidance: Disability at onset - SPSD symptoms established; mRS. Only report if mRS is explicitly mentioned or if mRS can be clearly inferred from description.
0 - No symptoms.
1 - No significant disability. Able to carry out all usual activities, despite some symptoms.
2 - Slight disability. Able to look after own affairs without assistance, but unable to carry out all previous activities.
3 - Moderate disability. Requires some help, but able to walk unassisted (i.e., without another person).
4 - Moderately severe disability. Unable to attend to own bodily needs without assistance, and unable to walk unassisted.
5 - Severe disability. Requires constant nursing care and attention, bedridden, incontinent.
6 - Dead

timecourse_onset.description:
Section: 3. section: disease onset, signs and symptoms | Meaning: Time course of onset (select) | Guidance: Time course of onset (select)
- insidious = insidious/subacute
- relapsing-remitting = relapsing-remitting
- fulminant = fulimant/peracute

diagnosis_onset.description:
Section: 3. section: disease onset, signs and symptoms | Meaning: Diagnosis at onset (select) | Guidance: Diagnosis at onset (select)
- SPSD
- functional
- orthopaedic
- stroke
- seizure
- other = specify in next col

diagnosis_onset_other.description: Section: 3. section: disease onset, signs and symptoms | Meaning: Diagnosis at onset - other (text) | Guidance: Diagnosis at onset - other (text)

timecourse_subsequent.description:
Section: 3. section: disease onset, signs and symptoms | Meaning: Subsequent disease course (select) | Guidance: Subsequent disease course (select)
- monophasic
- relapsing-remitting = relapsing-remitting
- chronic_stable
- chronic-progressive
- rapidly-progressive

onset_to_established.description: Section: 3. section: disease onset, signs and symptoms | Meaning: Time from onset to fully established disease (months) | Guidance: Time from onset to fully established disease (months)

overview_established.description:
Section: 3. section: disease onset, signs and symptoms | Meaning: Overview_SPSD symptoms / established disease | Guidance: Overview_SPSD symptoms / established disease
- stiffness
- spasms
- startle = excessive startle

Section: 4. section: established disease, signs and symptoms | Meaning: Anxiety (select) | Guidance: Anxiety (select)

Section: 4. section: established disease, signs and symptoms | Meaning: Other symptoms: list all that apply within 1 cell, separated by semicolons | Guidance: Other symptoms: list all that apply within 1 cell, separated by semicolons (example: hyperhidrosis; babinski; sensory)
- hyperhidrosis

- hyperreflexia

other_symptoms_established_seizures.description: Section: 4. section: established disease, signs and symptoms | Meaning: Other symptoms: seizures (text) | Guidance: Other symptoms: seizures (text)

established_mRS.description:
Section: 4. section: established disease, signs and symptoms | Meaning: Disability when disease fully established (SPSD symptoms established; mRS | Guidance: Disability when disease fully established (SPSD symptoms established; mRS
0 - No symptoms.
1 - No significant disability. Able to carry out all usual activities, despite some symptoms.
2 - Slight disability. Able to look after own affairs without assistance, but unable to carry out all previous activities.
3 - Moderate disability. Requires some help, but able to walk unassisted (i.e., without another person).
4 - Moderately severe disability. Unable to attend to own bodily needs without assistance, and unable to walk unassisted.
5 - Severe disability. Requires constant nursing care and attention, bedridden, incontinent.
6 - Dead

course_treatment.description:
Section: 4. section: established disease, signs and symptoms | Meaning: Course / symptoms potentially influenced by treatment (select) | Guidance: Course / symptoms potentially influenced by treatment (select)
- none = no treatment
- sympt = benzodiazepine or similar
- immunotherapy
- both = both symptomatic and immunotherapy

antibody_status.description:
Section: 4. section: established disease, signs and symptoms | Meaning: Antibody status (select) | Guidance: Antibody status (select)
- GAD
- GlyR
- amphiphysin
- DPPX
- seronegative
- multiple = multiple, specify in next col
- other = other, specify in next col
- not_tested = no test performed
- NA = not available, not reported, unclear if tested

antibody_status_other.description:
Section: 4. section: established disease, signs and symptoms | Meaning: Antibody status (other) | Guidance: Antibody status (other)
If "other" was selected, list as text. Otherwise, leave blank.

antibody_titre.description: Section: 4. section: established disease, signs and symptoms | Meaning: Antibody titre | Guidance: Antibody titre

antibody_units.description: Section: 4. section: established disease, signs and symptoms | Meaning: Antibody units | Guidance: Antibody units

antibody_tests.description: Section: 4. section: established disease, signs and symptoms | Meaning: Antibodies tested | Guidance: Antibodies tested list all antibodies that were tested, separated by semicolons

antibody_testsystem.description: Section: 4. section: established disease, signs and symptoms | Meaning: Antibody test system | Guidance: Antibody test system

antibody_notes.description:
Section: 4. section: established disease, signs and symptoms | Meaning: Antibody notes | Guidance: Antibody notes
If not covered by columns to the left, give as text note. Otherwise, leave blank.

CSF_status.description:
Section: 4. section: established disease, signs and symptoms | Meaning: CSF (select) | Guidance: CSF (select) - normal
- inflammatory
- isolated protein elevation
- not_done = no CSF analysis performed
- antibody_present = antibody present in CSF (specify Ab and titre in next cols)
- NA = not available

CSF_antibody.description: Section: 5. section: investigations (antibodies, electrophysiology, other) | Meaning: CSF antibody (specify) | Guidance: CSF antibody (specify)

CSF_antibody_titre.description: Section: 5. section: investigations (antibodies, electrophysiology, other) | Meaning: CSF antibody titre (numeric) | Guidance: CSF antibody titre (numeric)

CMUA.description:
Section: 5. section: investigations (antibodies, electrophysiology, other) | Meaning: continuous motor unit activity (CMUA) | Guidance: continuous motor unit activity (CMUA)
0 = not detected
1 = present
NA = no EMG / unknown

exteroceptive_refl.description:
Section: 5. section: investigations (antibodies, electrophysiology, other) | Meaning: enhanced exteroceptive reflexes | Guidance: enhanced exteroceptive reflexes
0 = not detected
1 = present
NA = not done / unknown

brainstem_refl.description:
Section: 5. section: investigations (antibodies, electrophysiology, other) | Meaning: brainstem reflexes | Guidance: brainstem reflexes
0 = not detected
1 = present
NA = not done / unknown

MRI_normal.description:
Section: 5. section: investigations (antibodies, electrophysiology, other) | Meaning: MRI | Guidance: MRI
0 = normal
1 = abnormal (specify in next col)
NA = no MRI performed, not reported, unclear

MRI_abnormalities.description: Section: 5. section: investigations (antibodies, electrophysiology, other) | Meaning: MRI abnormalities (text) | Guidance: MRI abnormalities (text)

tu_screening.description:
Section: 5. section: investigations (antibodies, electrophysiology, other) | Meaning: Tumour screening | Guidance: Tumour screening
0 = normal / no tumour detected
1 = abnormal (specify in next col)
NA = not performed

tu_screening_abnormal.description:
Section: 5. section: investigations (antibodies, electrophysiology, other) | Meaning: Tumour screening abnormal | Guidance: Tumour screening abnormal
specify tumour entity with text

immunotherapy.description:
Section: 5. section: investigations (antibodies, electrophysiology, other) | Meaning: Immunotherapy (specify) | Guidance: Immunotherapy (specify)
- none = not done
- steroids
- IVIG
- PLEX
- RXB = Rituximab
- CP = Cyclophopsphamide
- Aza = Azathioprine
- HSCT
- multiple = specify in next col
- other = specify in next col
- NA = unknown

immuntherapy_detail.description: Section: 6. section: treatment | Meaning: Immunotherapy in detail (please describe dose, how many cycles, intervals) | Guidance: Immunotherapy in detail (please describe dose, how many cycles, intervals)

immunotherapy_effect.description:
Section: 6. section: treatment | Meaning: Effect of immunotherapy (select) | Guidance: Effect of immunotherapy (select)
- none
- worsening
- improvement
- stabilisation
- NA = not known

sympt_treatment.description:
Section: 6. section: treatment | Meaning: Symptomatic treatment (select) | Guidance: Symptomatic treatment (select)
- none
- clonazepam
- benzo = other benzodiazepines
- baclofen
- gabapentin
- pregabalin
- tizanidine
- valproate
- other (specify)

sympt_treatment_detail.description: Section: 6. section: treatment | Meaning: symptomatic treatment in detail (please describe route of administration and dose) | Guidance: symptomatic treatment in detail (please describe route of administration and dose)

sympt_treatment_effect.description:
Section: 6. section: treatment | Meaning: Effect of symptomatic treatment (select) | Guidance: Effect of symptomatic treatment (select)
- none
- worsening
- improvement
- stabilisation
- NA = not known

other_treatment.description:
Section: 7. section: concomittant disease and family history | Meaning: Other treatment (text) | Guidance: Other treatment (text)
(e.g. tumour therapy)

autoimmunity.description:
Section: 7. section: concomittant disease and family history | Meaning: Concomitant autoimmunity (select) | Guidance: Concomitant autoimmunity (select)
- none
- thyroid = thyroid disease/thyroid antibodies
- diabetes
- vitiligo
- gastric = pernicious anaemia/parietal cell antibodies
- other= other, specify in next col

autoimmunity_specify.description: Section: 7. section: concomittant disease and family history | Meaning: Concomitant autoimmunity (specify with text) | Guidance: Concomitant autoimmunity (specify with text)

family_history.description:
Section: 8.section: comments | Meaning: Family history (select) | Guidance: Family history (select)
- none = no fhx for SPSD or autoimmunity
- autoimmune = fhx for autoimmunity (specify in next col)
- SPSD = fhx for SPSD (specify in next col)
- NA = unknown, not reported

family_history_abnormal.description:
Section: 8.section: comments | Meaning: Family history (text) | Guidance: Family history (text)
if autoimmune diseases and/or SPSD are present, specify with text

notes.description: Section: 8.section: comments | Meaning: Any observations or aspects not covered but worth mentioning | Guidance: Any observations or aspects not covered but worth mentioning

FU_duration.description: Section: section: basic demographic data | Meaning: Follow Up (years) | Guidance: Follow Up (years) | Original column header: FU_duration (Excel column H)
